internet bibliography ecommerce biology and other research tasks where it is needed to estimate importance of certain objects there are studies on the adaptation of pagerank to application in distributed computing in some types of distributed systems one of the trends in the field of distributed systems is the increasing interest in distributed systems functioning not just in unreliable network but where participants of the system itself can not trust each other in particular those which utilize byzantine fault tolerance algorithm bft this article proposes an adaptation of the pagerank ranking algorithm for distributed bft systems it includes a brief overview of modifications of pagerank algorithm for distributed systems their features and disadvantages as well as the
